original_text: Bring them to me, the Lord. The priests will throw salt on them. Then they will offer them to me as a burnt offering.
korean_text: 나 여호와 앞에 받들어다가 제사장은 그 위에 소금을 쳐서 나 여호와께 번제로 드릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: Bring them to me, the Lord.
The priests will throw salt on them.
Then they will offer them to me
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그것들을 나에게 드릴 것이다
